text:
Wag Labs, Inc. | https://wagwalking.com | Los Angeles (West Hollywood) or SF Bay Area (Burlingame) | Full Time | ONSITE

"Wag is the best-designed and most efficient app for summoning a dog walker with some or no advance notice." - NY Times https://wag.me/nytimes

Our mission is to make it easier to own a dog and we're looking for experienced engineers to build a reliable and wonderful experience across mobile devices and the web for thousands of dog owners and dog walkers every day.

Our product and engineering team is expanding so it's a great opportunity to have a lot of impact and ownership while we continue to grow. We're backed by several top VCs and offer our services in more than 50 cities in the US.

Weâ€™re looking to hire:

- iOS Engineers (Obj-C)

- Android Engineers (Java)

- Backend Engineers (PHP/Laravel)

- Data Analysts (SQL)

- UI/UX Designers (iOS/Android)

- Project Managers (Agile)

Apply here: https://wag.me/ishiring and we will get back to you shortly!
